channel.title: How do set up a ham server
channel.description: i wenyt throught it all and got totally lost so it would be cool if some1 could help me

item.title: How do set up a ham server
item.dc:creator: @aronscape aronscape
item.description:
@aronscape wrote:

Download hamachi.
follow the steps.
Make a name
make a network whit NAME+PASS
EXAMPLE: Aronscape pass=motherfucker

so if players want to yoin your server they first click YOIN network they type in Aronscape and pass motherfucker

then they look at your ip ON HAMACHI

Then they start moparscape and login your server whit typing your HAMACHI ip in the ip-box

Read full topic
item.source: How do set up a ham server
